title: Clinical Metaproteomics 3: Verification
questions: Why do we need to verify our identified peptides
What is the importance of making a new database for quantification
objectives: Verification of peptides helps in confirming the presence of the peptides in our samplle
key_points: Extraction of accession numbers for getting protein sequences
